parameters.name: KeepRelations
parameters.description: True to keep the sketch relations intact, false to sever them

parameters.description: x coordinate of the base point

parameters.name: BaseY
parameters.description: y coordinate of the base point

parameters.name: DestX
parameters.description: x coordinate of the destination stretch

parameters.name: DestY
parameters.description: y coordinate of the destination of the stretch
